headline: Ruchika Budhraja,  Drew Hodel
abstract: The couple met in 2018 through a Facebook colleague of the bride.
lead_paragraph: Ruchika Budhraja and Drew John Hodel were married Jan. 19 at the Ritz Carlton, Laguna Niguel in Dana Point, Calif. Sujata Seth, the brideâ€™s aunt and a Universal Life minister, officiated.
